overview: Julia is seven years.old. She was born in prison and had a different mother at three different periods of time. All of these women attempt to mother her now. They want what’s best for the child, but their actions threaten the future of the girl. The director Natalia Kadyrova met the film’s protagonist when she was shooting her previous film. It dealt with an experiment –  the children lived together with their sentenced parents in jail.
title: A Mom for Julia
